DOC.brief_title: Cross-over Study Prove Bioequivalence Between Two Oral Formulations Levonorgestrel 1.5 mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 18 55 year old normal vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , blood chemistry , liver function profile urinalysis . Subjects take medication within 14 day elimination period le 7 halflives ( whichever long ) study startup .
